sentences.english: The village leader, Mr. Tian, asks Wei Minzhi to take Mr. Gao's place until he comes back.
sentences.chinese: 田村長讓魏敏芝替高老師代課，直到他回來。

sentences.english: However, the long-expected "new" head acts exactly like the "old" one.
sentences.chinese: 可是他們期待的新村長依然走着上一任村長的老路。

sentences.english: However, the long-expected "new" head acts exactly like the "old" one.
sentences.chinese: 可是他們期待的新村長依然走着上一任村長的老路。

sentences.english: First explain why Patels, the head of a village needs reservations?
sentences.chinese: 首先解釋爲什麼作爲村長的帕特爾人要保留名額？

sentences.english: The village head led several farmers to plough for the heir less elderly.
sentences.chinese: 村長帶着幾個人爲村裏的孤寡老人代耕田地。

sentences.english: The village chief because of illness for long to help him to inspect the sentries.
sentences.chinese: 村長因爲生病讓長文幫他去查哨。

sentences.english: The village head is planning a learning program for villagers in this year's slack winter season.
sentences.chinese: 村長打算利用今年的農閒時節，組織一次冬學。

sentences.english: Retired old person and student village mayor Li Yue, early in the village Department waiting.
sentences.chinese: 退休的老支書和大學生村長李月，早在村部門前等候。

sentences.english: In order to save the Village Chief, Goku must match strength and wits against General White.
sentences.chinese: 要想救出村長，小悟空必須和白將軍鬥智鬥勇一番。

sentences.english: A deputation of elders from the village arrived headed by its chief.
sentences.chinese: 村裏的長者代表團在村長的帶領下到達了。

sentences.english: I'd need to also report them to either the local livestock department or my village head," said Noor Hassan, a shopkeeper in Tangerang’s Bunder village.
sentences.chinese: 我應當將此事向當地畜牧部門或我的村長報告。

sentences.english: Hundreds of households in the area have followed his lead.
sentences.chinese: 緊隨着村長，數百戶的村民先後用上了再生能源。

sentences.english: Bason : Who is this man? You're the master, who actually doesn't do anything.
sentences.chinese: 你誰啊，你是村長，實際上卻什麼事也沒做。

sentences.english: Egrets credit outstanding, by the villagers for election I village head.
sentences.chinese: 白鷺功勞傑出，被村民們選舉爲西村村長。

definition: to depart as quick as a flash/flash mob
imaginative/to have one's mind buzzing with ideas
to lead the way/to guide/to show the way/fig. to instruct
son of the boss/young master of the house/your son (honorific)
roll call/to mention sb by name/(to call or praise or criticize sb) by name
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
